1 September 2008

3 – Barry Kelly

by Jim McKeeth

In this episode we interview Barry Kelly who is one of the talented software engineers working on the Delphi compiler at Embarcadero’s CodeGear.  We will discusses native code garbage collectors, generics, Anonymous methods and more.

  • SmartInspect give away - Enter to win a free license
  • Barry's Blog
  • Barry's native code garbage collector for Delphi - Barry wrote this free conservative garbage collector for Win32 Delphi that he discusses in the podcast.
  • Example of a value typed TStringList - We discussed this a bit during the podcast as an example pattern of how to fake garbage collector.
  • CodeRage 2007 replay with Barry Kelly - Talking with David I about the Delphi compiler and working at CodeGear.
tags: anonymous methods - Audio podCast - compiler - delphi - garbage collection - generics
